question: When did The Lion King musical first debut?
predAns: The Lion King musical first debuted on Broadway on November 13, 1997.
oriSent: The Lion King musical first debuted on July 8, 1997, at the Orpheum Theatre in Minneapolis, Minnesota.

question: Where did The Lion King musical premiere after its instant success?
predAns: It premiered on Broadway at the New Amsterdam Theatre
oriSent: It was an instant success and later premiered on Broadway at the New Amsterdam Theatre on October 15.
